Package com.horaz.client.widgets.events

Interface Summary
F simulates a anonymous JS function
 

Class Summary
EventFactory helper for native event binding
ItemApplyListener<T extends BaseModel> If you have to do some special formatting or layouting on some explicit models, there is hook for manipulating the new li-element that was created from the template.
ItemClickListener<T extends BaseModel> when a item was clicked in the listview, this event will be fired.
TapListener tap listener. is used for handling tap/touch/click events
